name: You Will Fall
storyline: You're standing on the roof of a building staring at the thin tightrope stretched taught over the wide expanse. Your one goal is to make it across. Only problem is, you will fall. It is inevitable. Good thing you have this voice inside your head to constantly remind you of your fate.
summary: You're standing on the roof of a building staring at the thin tightrope stretched taught over the wide expanse. Your one goal is to make it across. Only problem is, you will fall. It is inevitable. Good thing you have this voice inside your head to constantly remind you of your fate.
